channel.title: Project Pearl Pk Source!NEW! ITEMS ADDED!
channel.description:
Hello im Going to change my normal project pearl server to a pk server so ppl can just enjoy things im going to do
* Trying to add pvp levels need help with that * Kq with full tunnel,correct animations and req of rope(Need to do 20%more) * Going to add drops like Real pvp * Maybde adding new jad with hd animations * Yring to add new pk quest for new Pvp Items * Fully working prayer with interfaces+ Need help with the skull and pray icons if somone want to help me pm me please;)
My did list :D: Clue Scrolls are made bether so they are longer like you need to kill a npc before you can get casket. New Donator rank Shops Are closer 2 wild Banks at wildy if you login you are auto pure 2! I edited d bow spec so you dont get that mage bow thing i edited d claws spec trying to find good spec for vesta longsword.. !NEW! [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/11l7y12.jpg[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/zikkt1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2r1zbkm.jpg[/img]
My First source is Project Pearl so im now making it Only pk so here are some pic's i already added some pvp items added spec not currectly but im trying to..
I deleted that blue thing with spec so its like rs ;D [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/15ml54i.jpg[/img]
D claws hits 40+ with spec trying to hit 4 times with spec .. [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2uh63ih.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/wu4f1g.jpg[/img]
I'm maybe realising when i'm finished for the guys how only want pk and dont know how to code xD Maybe you guys/girls got any ideas just send me a message ;)
NEW UPDATES! Rune c bow hits alot more not the dumb 16 hits. [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2udxa2p.jpg[/img] Mage Bow hit alot more with spec so its usefully with pk [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/vn322g.jpg[/img] Dbow and Mage bow doesn't show no 3rd spec arrow more its just 2 speced arrows not more ;)

item.dc:creator: @moh moh
item.description:
@moh wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:24, topic:259177”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=342234.msg2661499#msg2661499 date=1234223455]

Delta, NPCs moved with crappy models added into the client, we definitely need more of these.

Who cares idiot, its moparscape.

For one, I care. I’m pretty sure the forum has enough of these.

QFT. I am starting to get tired of seeing DeltaScape sources that are barely edited.
[/quote]

100% true.

lots of servers are delta based, and most of the servers are quite the same as each other…

delta with faster training W00. HOPE TO SEE THAT SOMETIME lawl.[/quote]
Bweh why you send this here? i don’t want to know that because i finnaly learned how to code with delta …

Read full topic
